name: Tổng hợp ôn tập TOEIC (Reading & Grammar)
description: Bộ câu hỏi bao gồm Ngữ pháp và Đọc hiểu (đã cập nhật đáp án theo Teacher's Key).

questions.question: Botswana is famous ______ its diamond mines.
questions.explanation: Famous for: nổi tiếng vì điều gì.

questions.question: Padang food is a style of Indonesian food that is eaten ______ one's fingers.
questions.explanation: Eat with fingers: ăn bằng tay (chỉ công cụ).

questions.question: This package must be in Wellington at least ______ noon Tuesday.
questions.explanation: By + mốc thời gian: trước hoặc muộn nhất là (deadline).

questions.question: Ms. Chadwick was disappointed ______ the results of the advertising campaign.
questions.explanation: Disappointed with: thất vọng với.

questions.question: The cheapest way to move goods overseas is ______, but that is also the slowest way.
questions.explanation: By + phương tiện số ít (by ship).

questions.question: ______ the next few months, we hope to arrange a joint venture with a company in the Czech Republic.
questions.explanation: Within + khoảng thời gian: trong vòng.

questions.question: Choudhuri was hired because he is familiar ______ the latest developments in biotechnology.
questions.explanation: Familiar with: am hiểu/quen thuộc với.

questions.question: Most of the delegates arrived ______ limousines.
questions.explanation: Arrive in + car/taxi/limousine.

questions.question: The store is open ______ nine to six.
questions.explanation: From... to...: từ... đến...

questions.question: Bonnie has been married ______ Steve for two years.
questions.explanation: Married to someone: kết hôn với ai.

questions.question: If there ______ an unforeseen delay, we will finish this project by the end of the month.
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 1.

questions.question: I am afraid we cannot agree to this proposal ______ the offer is substantially improved.
questions.explanation: Unless = If not (trừ khi).

questions.question: According to the doctor, you will feel better within a week if you ______ this medication as prescribed.
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 1 (If + hiện tại đơn).

questions.question: Where ______ choose to go, if you could get a job in any city in the world?
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 2 (giả định không thật).

questions.question: If Keiji ______ to the trade show, he will not be able to attend the monthly meeting.
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 1.

questions.question: Our insurance company ______ the damage done during the storm if we had renewed our policy on time.
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 3 (trái với quá khứ).

questions.question: If I ______ you, I would get as much experience in the hospitality industry as possible...
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 2 (If I were you).

questions.question: If we ______ enough money in advance, we would not have been able to expand the business...
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 3 (If + Past Perfect).

questions.question: If you see Mr. Hawkins this afternoon, ______ tell him about the new manufacturing project?
questions.explanation: Câu yêu cầu/hỏi lịch sự (loại 1).

questions.question: Nobody would have known about the leak in the supply room, if Dan ______ it by chance one day.
questions.explanation: Câu điều kiện loại 3.

questions.question: Each employee ______ required to complete the survey.
questions.explanation: Each + danh từ số ít -> động từ số ít.

questions.question: The boxes ______ in the storage room.
questions.explanation: The boxes (số nhiều) -> are.

questions.question: A number of requests ______ pending.
questions.explanation: A number of (nhiều) -> động từ số nhiều.

questions.question: The number of requests ______ increasing.
questions.explanation: The number of (con số/số lượng) -> động từ số ít.

questions.question: Neither the manager nor the assistants ______ available this morning.
questions.explanation: Neither...nor: chia theo danh từ gần nhất (assistants - số nhiều).

questions.question: The committee ______ divided on the issue.
questions.explanation: Danh từ tập hợp thường chia số ít (trong ngữ pháp TOEIC phổ thông).

questions.question: The data ______ inconclusive at this stage.
questions.explanation: (Theo đáp án giáo viên): 'Data' được coi là số ít không đếm được. Dùng 'has been' để nhấn mạnh trạng thái kéo dài đến hiện tại ('at this stage').

questions.question: More than one applicant ______ misread the instructions.
questions.explanation: (Theo đáp án giáo viên): Dựa trên ý nghĩa 'hơn một người' tức là 'nhiều người' nên dùng số nhiều 'have'. (Lưu ý: Ngữ pháp chuẩn mực thường dùng số ít 'has', nhưng đáp án này tuân theo key của bài thi).

questions.question: Ten dollars ______ not enough to cover the fee.
questions.explanation: Tiền bạc (tổng thể) -> động từ số ít.

questions.question: There ______ a printer and two scanners in the meeting room.
questions.explanation: There + be: chia theo danh từ đứng liền sau (a printer - số ít).

questions.question: All the technical staff ______ we employ are fully trained professionals.
questions.explanation: Who thay thế cho người.

questions.question: The processing factory, ______ we visited only last month, has temporarily shut down...
questions.explanation: Which thay thế cho vật (factory) trong mệnh đề không xác định.

questions.question: The shift supervisor ______ spoke to you is called Mr. Hughes.
questions.explanation: That có thể thay thế cho Who trong mệnh đề xác định.

questions.question: The customer ______ soup was cold was offered a discount of 10 percent.
questions.explanation: Whose chỉ sở hữu.

questions.question: Nobody could remember the name of the restaurant ______ we had dined the previous evening.
questions.explanation: Where thay thế cho nơi chốn.

questions.question: The trainee with ______ you will be working is inexperienced, but very enthusiastic.
questions.explanation: Sau giới từ (with) phải dùng Whom.

questions.question: We were rather surprised to find the report ______ we received from the supplier was full of criticism.
questions.explanation: That thay thế cho vật (report).

questions.question: The accountant ______ figures you queried has replied by e-mail...
questions.explanation: Whose chỉ sở hữu (số liệu của kế toán).

questions.question: The investigators were surprised by ______ they found during the inspection.
questions.explanation: What = the thing that (những gì).

questions.question: The complex merger finally went through, ______ was a great relief to both companies.
questions.explanation: Which thay thế cho cả mệnh đề phía trước.
